mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ord_delivery_info_details WHERE order_no = #{orderNumber} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_delivery_info_details (order_no, logistic_status, create_time, description, operation_type, operator_no, warehouse_no, task_no) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{logisticStatus},#{createTime}, #{description}, #{operationType},#{operatorNo}, #{warehouseNo}, #{taskNo})
mapper.select: SELECT e.`name` deliveryName, e.mobile deliveryPhone, odi.order_no orderNumber, oli.warehouse warehouseName FROM ord_delivery_info_details AS odi INNER JOIN emp_employee AS e ON e.delivery_clerk_no = odi.operator_no INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON oli.delivery_clerk_no = odi.operator_no WHERE odi.order_no = #{orderNumber} AND odi.operator_no = #{operatorNo} LIMIT 1

SELECT obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, obi.ord_no orderNumber, oli.shipping_address, oli.delivery_time deliveryTime, oli.receiver receiver, oli.receiver_phone receiverPhone, odid.task_no shipperNumber, obd.collection_amount collectionAmount FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON obi.ord_no = odid.order_no INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON obi.ord_no = oli.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_billing_details AS obd ON obi.ord_no = obd.ord_no WHERE odid.operation_type = '已封车' AND odid.operator_no = #{operatorNo}
